scripts.electron:pack: npm run build && APPLEID='menzorg@gmail.com' CSC_NAME='ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' electron-builder --publish never -c ./electron-builder.config.json
scripts.electron:sign: npm run electron:sign-prod && npm run electron:sign-dev
scripts.electron:sign-prod: electron-osx-sign dist/mas/Deep.Case.app --entitlements=./entitlements.mas.plist --entitlements-inherit=./entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --identity='Developer ID Application: ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' --platform=mas --type=distribution --provisioning-profile=developer-id-deepcase.provisionprofile
scripts.electron:sign-dev: electron-osx-sign dist/mas-dev/Deep.Case.app --identity='Developer ID Application: ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' --platform=mas --type=development --entitlements=./entitlements.mas.plist --entitlements-inherit=./entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --provisioning-profile=./deepcasedevelopment.provisionprofile
scripts.electron:make: npm run build && electron-builder build -c ./electron-builder.config.json -p always
